name: Animal Speed Dating
description:
This game was made for KenneyJam 2021 using only assets from Kenney.nl!  In this game, rotate through three special candidates by speed-dating!  Get to know your new friends and pick your favorite!

- The UI is all recolored/resized elements from the Fixed UI and Space UI packs.

- The background is a recolored texture from the Prototype Pack

- Title card is made with Emotes Pack

- The only non-Kenney assets used were Fonts (Round Pop and Franxurter) as well as the BGM, Blippy Trance a la Kevin McCleod

- The characters are built using the Modular Character and Animal Pack Redux (funfact: Lup's tongue is a recolored shoe and Alle's blush marks are recolored noses!)

Some creative stacking was needed!
